com.mobilerq.android.sdk

Class MrqContentListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.mobilerq.android.sdk.MrqContentListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class MrqContentListAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    Adapt a list of MrqContent to a list of View. Each view is adjusted to fit the width and height of content. The view has a short animation that fades alpha from transparent to opaque after content is loaded. Set setFilter(Predicate) to filter the content passed to updateContentList(List). Set setLimit(int) to limit the filtered content. When items are viewed onItemViewed(MrqContentView) is called.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static interface  MrqContentListAdapter.OnContentViewListener
      A listener for content views.

      • onItemViewed

        public void onItemViewed(MrqContentView cv)

        Parameters:

      • getView

        public MrqContentView getView(int position,
                     android.view.View convertView,
                     android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        Get the MrqContentView loaded with content at position. Each view is adjusted to fit the width of parent and height of content. The view has a short animation that fades alpha from transparent to opaque after content is loaded. This will call onItemViewed(MrqContentView) when the item has been attached.
        Parameters:
        position - The content position
        convertView - The old view to reuse
        parent - the parent group
        Returns:
        the view for the position
